nodeList.loreText: Any bones, any marrow, can be your tools, even your own.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Fires sharpened bones from your body. The bones pierce through enemies inflicting physical damage. Instead of mana, 8% of your current health is consumed to cast this spell.

nodeList.description: You leech a portion of physical damage as health if you have cast Marrow Shards recently (past 4 seconds).
nodeList.nodeDescription: You leech [3%] of physical damage as health per point if you have cast marrow shards in the past 4 seconds.

node.description: Marrow Shards and {Bone Splinters} hits deal significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Marrow Shards no longer pierces.
node.nodeDescription: Marrows shards deals double damage, but no longer pierces.

node.loreText: Any bones, any marrow, can be your tools, even your own.
node.nodeDescription: Fires sharpened bones from your body. The bones pierce through enemies inflicting physical damage. Instead of mana, 8% of your current health is consumed to cast this spell.

node.altText: {Bone Splinters} scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: Marrow Shards creates {Bone Splinters} in a cone behind the enemy when destroyed, damaging other enemies, but Marrow Shards no longer pierces and costs more health.
node.nodeDescription: Marrow shards no longer pierces and costs 50% increased health. When marrow shards hits an enemy it creates splinters in a cone behind the enemy, hitting other enemies in the area.\n\nThe splinters scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.

node.description: {Bone Splinters} deal more damage.
node.nodeDescription: The splinters deal [25%] increased damage per point

node.altText: {Bone Splinters} scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: Marrow Shards creates {Bone Splinters} in a cone when destroyed, which damage enemies, but Marrow Shards travels less far and costs more health.
node.nodeDescription: 20% reduced range. 40% increased health cost. When marrow shards are destroyed they create a splinters in a cone, damaging enemies in the area.\n\nThe splinters scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.

nodeList.description:
If you have exactly two minions when you cast Marrow Shards, you have increased critical strike chance for 2 seconds. 

You cannot have multiple instances of this buff at once.

node.description:
Marrow Shards and {Bone Splinters} deal more damage, but Marrow Shards can hit and damage your own minions. 

On hit effects, such as health gained on hit, do not proc when you hit your minions.

nodeList.description: {Marrow Orbs} return more health.
nodeList.nodeDescription: The marrow orb returns [7] additional health per point

node.altText: {Marrow Orbs} are a bloody projectile which restores health upon returning to you.
node.description: Marrow Shards has a chance to create a {Marrow Orb} on hit that returns 15 health to you.
node.nodeDescription: Marrow shards has 20% chance to create a marrow orb on hit that returns 15 health to you

node.description: Marrow Shards and {Bone Splinters} have a chance to cause enemies to bleed, but Marrow Shards costs more health.
node.nodeDescription: [10%] increased health cost per point. [25%] additional chance to inflict bleeding on hit per point.

node.loreText: Any bones, any marrow, can be your tools, even your own.
node.nodeDescription: Fires sharpened bones from your body. The bones pierce through enemies inflicting physical damage. Instead of mana, 8% of your current health is consumed to cast this spell.

nodeList.description: Marrow Shards and {Bone Splinters} hits deal significantly more damage (multiplicative with other modifiers), but Marrow Shards no longer pierces.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Marrows shards deals double damage, but no longer pierces.

node.loreText: Any bones, any marrow, can be your tools, even your own.
node.nodeDescription: Fires sharpened bones from your body. The bones pierce through enemies inflicting physical damage. Instead of mana, 8% of your current health is consumed to cast this spell.

node.altText: {Bone Splinters} scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: Marrow Shards creates {Bone Splinters} in a cone behind the enemy when destroyed, damaging other enemies, but Marrow Shards no longer pierces and costs more health.
node.nodeDescription: Marrow shards no longer pierces and costs 50% increased health. When marrow shards hits an enemy it creates splinters in a cone behind the enemy, hitting other enemies in the area.\n\nThe splinters scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.

node.description: {Bone Splinters} deal more damage.
node.nodeDescription: The splinters deal [25%] increased damage per point

node.altText: {Bone Splinters} scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.
node.description: Marrow Shards creates {Bone Splinters} in a cone when destroyed, which damage enemies, but Marrow Shards travels less far and costs more health.
node.nodeDescription: 20% reduced range. 40% increased health cost. When marrow shards are destroyed they create a splinters in a cone, damaging enemies in the area.\n\nThe splinters scale with increases to physical damage and spell damage, but not with other nodes on this tree unless stated otherwise.

nodeList.description:
Marrow Shards and {Bone Splinters} deal more damage, but Marrow Shards can hit and damage your own minions. 

On hit effects, such as health gained on hit, do not proc when you hit your minions.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Marrow shards can hit and damage your own minions. 25% increased damage.\n\nOn hit effects such as health gained on hit, do not proc when you hit your minions.

node.description: You have a chance to immediately cast a second instance of Marrow Shards. The additional cast does cost health.
node.nodeDescription: You have [14%] chance per point to double cast marrow shards. The additional cast does cost health.

node.loreText: Any bones, any marrow, can be your tools, even your own.
node.nodeDescription: Fires sharpened bones from your body. The bones pierce through enemies inflicting physical damage. Instead of mana, 8% of your current health is consumed to cast this spell.

nodeList.altText: The damage bonus is only gained if a minion is consumed.
nodeList.description: Marrow Shards hits deal significantly more damage, but consumes one of your minions when you cast it.
nodeList.nodeDescription: Marrow shards consumes one of your minions when you cast it, gaining 100% increased damage.
